scripts.build:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
              libgtk-4-1 \
              libgraphene-1.0-0 \
              gstreamer1.0-gl \
              gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad \
              libavif15 \
              libenchant-2-2 \
              libsecret-1-0 \
              libmanette-0.2-0 \
              libgles2 && \
            npm install && npx playwright install
